Up.Statement: UPDATE w2_Payment SET mobile_disp_flg = '0' WHERE mobile_disp_flg = '1' GO UPDATE w2_Payment SET mobile_disp_flg = '3' WHERE mobile_disp_flg = '2' GO UPDATE w2_ProductCategory SET [mobile_disp_flg] = '0' GO UPDATE w2_OrderMemoSetting SET valid_flg = '0' WHERE display_kbn = 'MB' GO UPDATE w2_OrderMemoSetting SET display_kbn = 'PC' WHERE display_kbn = 'MB' GO
